sen.j: 理子女王（まさこじょおう、元禄4年8月18日 (旧暦)（1691年9月10日） - 宝永7年6月4日 (旧暦)（1710年6月30日））は、紀州藩第5代藩主徳川吉宗（後の第8代征夷大将軍）の正室。
sen.e: Princess Masako,who was born on September 10, 1691 and died on June 30, 1710, was a lawful wife of Yoshimune TOKUGAWA, the 5th lord of the Kishu Domain. (the 8th shogun of TOKUGAWA Shogunate later)

The Princess Masako (September 10, 1691 - June 30, 1710) was the lawful wife of Yoshimune TOKUGAWA, the fifth lord of the Kishu Domain (later the eighth seii taishogun [literally, "great general who subdues the barbarians"]).
sen.cmt: the を補いました。生没年をカッコを使用して修正しました。a→the,5th→fifth と修正しました。ピリオドの位置を修正しました。8th→eighth,「征夷大将軍」の部分を修正しました。
sen.e: The Princess Masako (September 10, 1691 - June 30, 1710) was the lawful wife of Yoshimune TOKUGAWA, the fifth lord of the Kishu Domain (later the eighth seii taishogun [literally, "great general who subdues the barbarians"]).

sen.j: 伏見宮伏見宮貞致親王の王女。
sen.e: She was a princess of Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya.
She was a princess of the Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya.
She was a princess of the Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya.

sen.j: 紀州藩第2代藩主・徳川光貞正室の照子女王は伯母、第4代将軍・徳川家綱正室の顕子女王は叔母、第9代将軍・徳川家重正室の増子女王は姪に当たる。
sen.e: Princess Teruko, a lawful wife of Mitsusada TOKUGAWA who was the second lord of Kishu Domain, was Masako's aunt and Princess Kenshi, a lawful wife of Ietsuna TOKUGAWA, the fourth shogun of TOKUGAWA Shogunate was her aunt and Princess Zoushi,a lawful wife of Ieshige TOKUGAWA, the 9th shogun of TOKUGAWA Shogunate, was her niece.

The Princess Teruko, the lawful wife of Mitsusada TOKUGAWA who was the second lord of Kishu Domain, was Masako's aunt, and the Princess Kenshi, the lawful wife of the fourth Shogun Ietsuna TOKUGAWA was her aunt, and the Princess Zoushi, the lawful wife of the ninth Shogun Ieshige TOKUGAWA was her niece.
sen.cmt: the, を補いました。 カンマ、スペースを修正しました。a→the,shogun of TOKUGAWA shogunate→Shogun,9th→ninth と修正しました。
sen.e: The Princess Teruko, the lawful wife of Mitsusada TOKUGAWA who was the second lord of Kishu Domain, was Masako's aunt, and the Princess Kenshi, the lawful wife of the fourth Shogun Ietsuna TOKUGAWA was her aunt, and the Princess Zoushi, the lawful wife of the ninth Shogun Ieshige TOKUGAWA was her niece.

sen.j: 幼称は真宮（さなのみや）。
sen.e: Her childhood name was Sananomiya.
Her childhood name was Sananomiya.
Her childhood name was Sananomiya.

sen.j: 院号は寛徳院（かんとくいん）。
sen.e: Her given Buddhist title was Kantokuin.
Her ingo (a title of respect given to close female relatives of the emperor or a woman of comparable standing) was Kantokuin.
sen.cmt: 「院号」の部分を修正しました。Emperor→emperor と修正しました。
sen.e: Her ingo (a title of respect given to close female relatives of the emperor or a woman of comparable standing) was Kantokuin.

sen.j: 宝永3年（1706年）に吉宗と婚姻。
sen.e: In 1706 she married Yoshimune.
In 1706 she married Yoshimune.
In 1706 she married Yoshimune.

sen.j: その後懐妊したが、宝永7年（1710年）5月27日 (旧暦)に死産となり、理子も同年6月4日に20歳で死去した。
sen.e: She became pregnant after the marriage, but had a stillbirth on May 27 in the7th year of Hoei era (1710) and she died on June 4 in the same year at age 20.
She became pregnant after the marriage, but had a stillbirth on June 23, 1710 and she died on June 30 in the same year at the age of 20.
sen.cmt: 宝永7年（1710年）5月27日→June 23, 1710 （グレゴリオ暦に変換）,同年6月4日→June 30,at age 20 （グレゴリオ暦に変換）→at the age of 20 と修正しました。
sen.e: She became pregnant after the marriage, but had a stillbirth on June 23, 1710 and she died on June 30 in the same year at the age of 20.

sen.j: 戒名は寛徳院玄真日中大姉。
sen.e: Her posthumous Buddhist name was Kantokuingenshinnicchuudaishi.
Her posthumous Buddhist name was Kantokuingenshinnicchudaishi.
Her posthumous Buddhist name was Kantokuingenshinnicchudaishi.

sen.j: 墓所は報恩寺 (和歌山市)、池上本門寺。
sen.e: Her grave is at Hoon-ji Temple (Wakayama city) and Ikegami Honmon-ji Temple.
Her graves are at Hoon-ji Temple (Wakayama city) and Ikegami Honmon-ji Temple.
sen.cmt: スペースを修正しました。grave is→graves are,city→City と修正しました。
sen.e: Her graves are at Hoon-ji Temple (Wakayama city) and Ikegami Honmon-ji Temple.
